title: Activity Stream & Draft Stories View
description: Two-column Journal tab with Draft Stories (Journal Entries) in left column and associated Raw Activities in right panel, filterable by Source or Temporal grouping

terminology.rawActivity: Individual event from connected tool (GitHub PR, Jira ticket, etc.)
terminology.journalEntry: = Draft Story. Auto-generated grouping of raw activities
terminology.draftStory: = Journal Entry. Same thing, user-facing name
terminology.careerStory: User-promoted narrative with explicit framework (STAR, etc.)

dependencies: Raw activities storage (DemoToolActivity or production equivalent)
Connected tool integrations (GitHub, Jira, Teams, etc.)
keyDecisions: Two-tab system: By Source and By Temporal
Two-column layout: Draft Stories (left) + Raw Activities (right)
Click Draft Story to reveal its associated raw activities
SVG tree-line connections for visual linking
openQuestions: How to handle Draft Stories with 100+ raw activities?
Should By Source tab show one Draft Story per source, or filter existing Draft Stories?
How to indicate which Draft Stories are ready for promotion to Career Story?
Should we show activity count badges on source icons?

files: index.html - Entry cards, source icons, tree-line patterns

relatedFeatures: career-stories-creation-flow - Promotes Draft Stories to Career Stories
